name: Guessing Game
desc: Developed a Java-based number guessing game application featuring user input, random number generation, and feedback on guesses.

name: Grade Calculator
desc: Developed a Java-based student grade calculator project utilizing user input for subject marks, computing average percentage, and determining grades.

name: Student Management System
desc: Developed a Java-based student management system enabling interactive functionalities like adding, removing, searching, and displaying student records via a command-line interface.

name: Watchlist-Application
desc: Developed a Java watchlist app allowing users to add,prioritize,comment,and rate movies.Integrated IMDb ratings for informed movie selection and prioritization options for personalized lists.

name: Book-Store
desc: Designed and developed a book store application in Java, enabling user registration and CRUD operations for book management.

name: Student Management System
desc: Engineered a robust student management system utilizing Spring Boot,Spring MVC,Spring Data JPA,and Thymeleaf,allowing seamless addition, update, and deletion of student records.

name: Job-App
desc: Developed a job application platform with Spring Web, Lombok, and JSP, enabling recruiters to post jobs and applicants to search based on their fields.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: Personal Portfolio Website. Don't Need Much Info About It, Just Scroll Down. You're Here Only!

name: Link List
desc: All major profile links in a single website. It's just like clone of link tree. Personalized and Responsive.
